name: Couples Therapy
description:
Game created for the United Game Jam (UGJ), 2020. It was made in under 48 hours.

The theme for the jam was: "TWO".

Hope you enjoy this game.

Credits:
  • Assets from Kenny NL:
    UI Pack: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack
    Modular Characters: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/modular-characters

  • Royalty Free Music from Bensound:
    Track: Retro Soul
    Composer: Benjamin Tissot (also known as Bensound)
    https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/retro-soul

  • Fonts from 1001fonts.com:
    Name: Lapsus Pro Font
    Made by Jose Roses
    https://www.1001fonts.com/lapsus-pro-font.html

  • Game made with Godot Engine
    https://godotengine.org/
